--- createLike.graphql
mutation {
  createLike(input: { uuid: "aaaa", sessionId: 12 }) {
    clientMutationId
    like {
      id
      session {
        id
        title
      }
    }
  }
}


--- Result
{"data":{"createLike":{"clientMutationId":null,"like":{"id":"Like:1","session":{"id":"Session:12","title":"Introduction to the Corporate Solutions Engineering"}}}}}

--- Result (formatted)
{
  "data": {
    "createLike": {
      "clientMutationId": null,
      "like": {
        "id": "Like:1",
        "session": {
          "id": "Session:12",
          "title": "Introduction to the Corporate Solutions Engineering"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
